page.title: 02ENGLISH CHINA CLAY
page.content: ECC (English China Clay) is a very important industry to our area, supplying much of the employment in the St. Blazey, Par and St. Austell areas. In Britain,china clay (kaolin) is only found in parts of Cornwall and South Devon.The granite in which it is found, also contains mica, quartz and tourmaline. For many years in Cornwall, china clay was obtained by washing it out of the kaolinised granite. Today, very powerful water hoses called monitors are used to direct a jet of water at the pit face with enough force to dislodge and remove the the clay in one operation.The water pressure is in the region of 300 pounds per square inch.
